# stellar-badge

## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Description                  | Type                                                                                   | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `text` _(required)_ | `text`    | It defines text of the badge | `string`                                                                               | `undefined` |
| `variant`           | `variant` | It defines type of the badge | `"default" \| "error" \| "info" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'default'` |
